title: Senior Real Estate Accountant
description: Accounting for real estate portfolios (commercial & residential). Property-level financial reporting. Service charge / ancillary cost accounting (Nebenkosten). Monthly & annual closings. Coordination with property managers and asset managers. Preparation of financial statements. Audit support.
required_skills: Real Estate Accountant or Property Accountant. Financial accounting. Property portfolios. IFRS or Swiss GAAP FER. German B2+. Accounting software (Abacus, SAP, Yardi, MRI). Excel advanced. Financial reporting. Closing processes.
required_education: Bachelor/Master in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration. Federal Diploma in Accounting (Fachausweis Finanz- und Rechnungswesen). CPA or equivalent.
